page.title: 20Conclusions on Horton.
page.content: This survey has shown that the Horton, Little Sodbury and Yate Rocks area is a quiet,peaceful area in which to live. Not many people live here and there are no big housing estates. Chipping Sodbury Quarry takes up a lot of land and produces a lot of traffic but does not seem to bother the county residents too much. This survey has been compiled by class A1 of King Edmund School,Yate,July 1985,led by their Humanities teacher Mr.R Malcolm. Contributions have been made by -{A.Buckley,S.Keedwell,C.Smart P.Bailey,D.Best,R.Bradley,C.Craig, K.Lake,S.Wallbridge,S.Glass,A.Hedges, A.Thompson,D.Starr,S.Jeffery,P.Meek, M.Nolder,S.Coleman,J.Crabtree,S.Gregg, E.Gannaway,S.Kite,J.Millman,G.Minto, S.Monks,T.Moss,M.Silsbury,J.Todd, C.Slade. The Head of school computing department M.R.D. Greenslade.
